"use client" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useTasks } from "../contexts/TaskContext" const TaskList = () => { const { tasks, loading, error, filters, sortBy, sortOrder, updateFilters, updateSorting } = useTasks() const handleFilterChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target updateFilters({ [name]: value }) } const handleSortChange = (field) => { if (sortBy === field) { updateSorting(field, sortOrder === "asc" ? "desc" : "asc") } else { updateSorting(field, "asc") } } const getSortIcon = (field) => { if (sortBy !== field) return null return sortOrder === "asc" ? "↑" : "↓" } const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case "high": return "bg-red-100 text-red-800" case "medium": return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800" case "low": return "bg-green-100 text-green-800" default: return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800" } } const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case "completed": return "bg-green-100 text-green-800" case "in-progress": return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800" case "pending": return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800" default: return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800" } } if (loading) { return
Loading tasks...
} if (error) { return
{error}
} return (

Filters

{tasks.length === 0 ? (

No tasks found. Try adjusting your filters or create a new task.

) : (
{tasks.map((task) => ( ))}
handleSortChange("title")} > Title {getSortIcon("title")} handleSortChange("status")} > Status {getSortIcon("status")} handleSortChange("priority")} > Priority {getSortIcon("priority")} handleSortChange("dueDate")} > Due Date {getSortIcon("dueDate")} Assigned To Documents Actions
{task.title}
 {task.status} {task.priority}
{new Date(task.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()}
{task.assignedTo?.email || "Unassigned"}
{task.documents && task.documents.length > 0 ? ( {task.documents.length} document(s) ) : ( No documents )}
View
)}
) } export default TaskList
